name: FIFA Manager 12
description:
Take control of an elite soccer franchise and lead them to glory on the pitch.
The most authentic soccer franchise simulation is back with FIFA Manager 12. You have total control over one of the world's premier soccer franchises and their success is in your hands. Set your team's training and practice regimens, devise their game strategies, and select your lineup. Employ a fitness coach to ensure your players are in top condition for the season. Manage your team not only on the pitch, but in the office as well. Analyze your squad's strengths and weaknesses and use the transfer market to try and lure the game's top stars to your team. The FIFA Manager 12 PC download features over 41,000 officially licensed players and over 13,000 player photos.

Take charge of your club at every level. Use your success on the field to attract big name sponsors, then utilize the revenue to keep your stadium and all of your facilities running smoothly. Older stadiums will need to be renovated and FIFA Manager 12 features 25 buildings with over 289 configuration levels.

There are over 700 new features and improvements including improved player AI, a more intuitive user interface, 3D matches, the Match Prognosis Tool, and much more. There are even new fan-requested features, like a revamped "final 24 hours of the transfer market" and pre-match speeches. It's all here in the FIFA Manager 12 PC download ... all the tools, all the action, all the control.
